title: Successful Castle Defense
content: Our guild successfully defended our castle against multiple attacks! Great teamwork everyone!

title: New Training Program
content: Introducing our new member training program. Join us every Wednesday for skill development sessions.

title: MVP Hunt Record
content: Guild team takes down 50 MVPs in a single day! New guild record achieved!

title: Guild Anniversary Event
content: Join us this weekend for our special anniversary celebration with prizes and events.

title: WoE Strategy Update
content: New castle defense formations announced. All members please check the Discord for details.
